function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty about the impact of COVID-19 on public space","Impact":"Potential transformation of public space may lead to new risks of disease propagation or social implications","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research and scenario planning to anticipate and address potential changes in public space usage","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling to simulate different scenarios, urban planning and design tools for creating safer and more adaptable public spaces","People":"General public, urban planners, policy makers","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities, urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Shift in acceptable and radical policies","Impact":"Adoption of policies that may affect public health and disease propagation","Mitigation":"Engage in open dialogue and debate to assess the potential consequences of new policies, consult with public health experts, and consider public health implications in policy decision-making","Technologies":"Policy modeling and analysis tools, communication platforms for public debate and consultation","People":"Policy makers, public health experts, general public","Owner":"Policy research organizations, public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Potential for rapid and radical changes in public space usage","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to unanticipated or inadequate changes in public space design and usage","Mitigation":"Engage in participatory design processes, involve public health experts and community stakeholders in decision-making, and conduct thorough impact assessments of proposed changes","Technologies":"Virtual reality design tools, community engagement platforms, impact assessment and modeling software","People":"Urban planners, architects, community members, public health experts","Owner":"Urban planning organizations, public health authorities, community organizations"}]}
